Title: Wen - WPF 3D Navigator
Description: Control the camera and the lights of a WPF 3D application without any code modification.
HomeWiki:
Wen

Wen is a tool that provides a navigation and control interface for WPF 3D applications. Features :
  • Camera position, direction and rotation controlling
  • Light position and direction controlling
  • Switch lights of the scene on / off
  • Visual indicators to show light positions and directions in the scene
  • Get back to default positions / directions

Help / Quick start

Help can be found on Wen home or in the documentation section.

Credits

Developed by Rémi Eynard.
Wen uses Snoop code injector.
